text: Eggs 'n' Baker is a Saturday morning Children's BBC music and cookery show presented by Bucks Fizz singer Cheryl Baker. It was often shown in the early morning slot before the magazine show, Going Live!. During this time Baker was still a member of Bucks Fizz and would often appear with the group on the show. The show ran on BBC1 from 1988 to 1993. ==References== Category:1988 British television series debuts Category:1993 British television series endings Category:1980s British children's television series Category:1990s British children's television series Category:1980s British cooking television series Category:1990s British cooking television series Category:BBC children's television shows Category:British cooking television shows Category:English-language television shows
title: Eggs 'n' Baker
